Uses of Class
java.security.PermissionCollection

Packages that use PermissionCollection
java.io Provides input and output facilities by means of streaming, file system access and serialization. 
java.net Provides networking-related functionality, such as streaming and datagram sockets, handling of Internet addresses, and dealing with HTTP requests. 
java.security This package provides all the classes and interfaces that constitute the Java security framework. 
java.util Provides an extensive set of utility classes. 
javax.security.auth This package provides the classes and interfaces needed to implemenet and program different methods of users' authentification and role based users' authorization. 
 

Uses of PermissionCollection in java.io
 

Subclasses of PermissionCollection in java.io
(package private)  class FilePermissionCollection
          Collects FilePermission objects and allows to query whether a particular permission is implied by it.
 

Methods in java.io that return PermissionCollection
 PermissionCollection FilePermission.newPermissionCollection()
          Returns a new PermissionCollection in which to place FilePermission objects.
 

Uses of PermissionCollection in java.net
 

Subclasses of PermissionCollection in java.net
(package private)  class SocketPermissionCollection
          This class represents a list of SocketPermission objects and provides a method to check whether or not a specific permission is implied by this SocketPermissionCollection.
 

Methods in java.net that return PermissionCollection
protected  PermissionCollection URLClassLoader.getPermissions(CodeSource codesource)
          Gets all permissions for the specified codesource.
 PermissionCollection SocketPermission.newPermissionCollection()
          Creates a new PermissionCollection to store SocketPermission objects.
 

Uses of PermissionCollection in java.security
 

Subclasses of PermissionCollection in java.security
(package private)  class AllPermissionCollection
          Specific PermissionCollection for storing AllPermissions.
(package private)  class BasicPermissionCollection
          Specific PermissionCollection for storing BasicPermissions of arbitrary type.
 class Permissions
          Permissions represents a PermissionCollection where the contained permissions can be of different types.
(package private)  class PermissionsHash
          A default PermissionCollection implementation that uses a hashtable.
(package private)  class UnresolvedPermissionCollection
          UnresolvedPermissionCollection represents a specific PermissionCollection for storing UnresolvedPermission instances.
 

Methods in java.security that return PermissionCollection
 PermissionCollection ProtectionDomain.getPermissions()
          Returns the static permissions that are granted to this ProtectionDomain.
protected  PermissionCollection SecureClassLoader.getPermissions(CodeSource codesource)
          Returns the PermissionCollection for the specified CodeSource.
abstract  PermissionCollection Policy.getPermissions(CodeSource cs)
          Returns a PermissionCollection describing what permissions are allowed for the specified CodeSource based on the current security policy.
 PermissionCollection Policy.getPermissions(ProtectionDomain domain)
          Returns a PermissionCollection describing what permissions are allowed for the specified ProtectionDomain (more specifically, its CodeSource) based on the current security policy.
 PermissionCollection UnresolvedPermission.newPermissionCollection()
          Returns a new PermissionCollection for holding UnresolvedPermission objects.
 PermissionCollection AllPermission.newPermissionCollection()
          Returns a new PermissionCollection for holding permissions of this class.
 PermissionCollection Permission.newPermissionCollection()
          Returns a specific PermissionCollection container for permissions of this type.
 PermissionCollection BasicPermission.newPermissionCollection()
          Returns an empty PermissionCollection for holding permissions.
(package private)  PermissionCollection UnresolvedPermissionCollection.resolveCollection(Permission target, PermissionCollection holder)
          Resolves all permissions of the same class as the specified target permission and adds them to the specified collection.
 

Methods in java.security with parameters of type PermissionCollection
(package private)  PermissionCollection UnresolvedPermissionCollection.resolveCollection(Permission target, PermissionCollection holder)
          Resolves all permissions of the same class as the specified target permission and adds them to the specified collection.
 

Constructors in java.security with parameters of type PermissionCollection
ProtectionDomain(CodeSource cs, PermissionCollection permissions)
          Constructs a new instance of ProtectionDomain with the specified code source and the specified static permissions.
ProtectionDomain(CodeSource cs, PermissionCollection permissions, ClassLoader cl, Principal[] principals)
          Constructs a new instance of ProtectionDomain with the specified code source, the permissions, the class loader and the principals.

(package private)  class PropertyPermissionCollection
          A PermissionCollection for holding PropertyPermissions.
 

Methods in java.util that return PermissionCollection
 PermissionCollection PropertyPermission.newPermissionCollection()
